title: Brie's City of Angels
description: Submissive in Love #6 (The Brie series continues!)Angels come in all shapes and sizes…Brie returns to LA with a friend spiraling out of control - a transformation is coming. In the midst of turmoil and change, love grows deeper. Brie will discover the truth about Rytsar’s past, and her Master will face a new challenge. Heartbreak and inspiration mark her time at home, but through it all the beauty of condor love prevails.In this sixth novella of the Submissive in Love series experience the inspiring love between Dominant and submissive in the midst of scorching hot sex, shocking scenes and masked gentlemen.Adult Material (18+)
author: Red Phoenix
